data.name: Ballex² - Map Editor (BME Pro)
data.detailed_description:
BME Pro is a powerful level editor for Ballex², you can use it to create levels and share them to the workshop.
BME Pro is more focused on increasing the freedom of level makers. Compared with the Ballex1 level editor (BME3), in BME Pro you can import your own models and textures, create custom materials, import your own sound effects and music, and even write your own logic to modify the game.

Before using the editor, it is highly recommended to read the tutorial in detail. Please click the tutorial button in the help of the menu bar, and it will automatically jump to the tutorial page.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 9500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i7 9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
